name: Cove Trapped
description:
If Undertale and Danganronpa had a baby, this would be the game. I and a friend created this game in under 3 weeks for a school project with the default RPG Maker assets. Our school loved the game and I hope you guys will too!

HERE IS THE WEB VERSION: https://ohspiderz.itch.io/cove-trapped-chromebook

Controls:

  • Movement:   Arrow keys
  • Action Button:   Z
  • Undo Button:   X
